## asyncLimit() function

异步函数并行执行限制。

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function asyncLimit<T extends (...args: any[]) => Promise<any>>(asyncFn: T, concurrency: number): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  asyncFn | T | 异步函数 |
|  concurrency | number | 并行量 |
